Title: North-Central APC Forum rejects Plateau party leaders’ rejection of Muftwang
Summary: North-Central All Progressives Congress Forum rejects Plateau party leaders’ rejection of Muftwang . Plateau APC leaders had, at a stakeholders’ meeting in Jos on October 17, 2025, rejected the resolution .

Title: Jubilation as Gov Ododo’s 500KVA transformer arrives Kogi community
Summary: People of the Ejule community in the Ofu Local Government Area of Kogi State exploded in jubilation on the arrival of the 500KVA transformer . Alhaji Ahmed Usman Ododo recently distributed the transformer .

Title: Bokku apologises as Nigerians condemn advert with ethnic slur
Summary: Nigerian grocery store Bokku Mart has deleted a controversial video posted for advertising and apologised to Nigerians . The video, currently raising dust online, was posted on its platform, but some of the influencer’s words did not go down well .

Title: UI, DAWN Commission champion academia–industry partnership for national devt
Summary: UI, DAWN Commission champion academia–industry partnership for national devt . University of Ibadan (UI), in collaboration with Development Agenda for Western Nigeria (DAWNN) Commission and Nigerian Association of Chambers of Commerce, Industry, Mines and Agriculture (NACCIMA) called for stronger partnerships between universities and industry players

Title: Subsidy removal: Jonathan faltered despite govs’ backing, Fayemi counters Emir Sanusi
Summary: Former Governor of Ekiti State, Dr Kayode Fayemi, said Jonathan lacked courage to fully implement the removal of fuel subsidy in 2012 despite widespread support from the Nigerian Governors’ Forum (NGF) at the time . Fayemi said former President Goodluck Jonathan lacked the courage to remove fuel subsidy .

Title: Boxing Day tradition altered as Premier League plans single fixture
Summary: Boxing Day tradition altered as Premier League plans single fixture . The move marks a rare deviation from one of English football’s most cherished traditions .

Title: Israel’s Netanyahu orders immediate strikes on Gaza
Summary: Itamar Ben Gvir, Israel's far-right national security minister accused Hamas of stalling: "It is time to break its legs once and for all"

Title: Our workforce is NPA’s most valuable asset – Dantsoho
Summary: The Nigerian Ports Authority has placed renewed emphasis on human capital development as the cornerstone of its operational excellence and long-term growth . NPA Managing Director, Dr. Abubakar Dantsoho, disclosed that while infrastructure and technology are important, our workforce is the Authority’s most valuable asset .

Title: Anambra Showdown 2025: Onitsha residents express total support for Soludo’s reelection
Summary: Thousands of enthusiastic residents from the 15 political wards in Onitsha North Local Government Area have declared total support for the reelection of Governor Chukwuma Soludo, as the 2025 Anambra governorship race gathers momentum .

Title: Manufacturers perceive cautious economic improvement
Summary: Manufacturers perceive cautious economic improvement . CEOs’ confidence index up marginally in Q3 . Capacity utilisation rises to 61.3% in H1 .

Title: FRSC seeks stronger youth engagement to tackle road crashes
MAN projects stronger Naira, 4% GDP growth in 2026
